=== DFT Input ===

*Sampling Rate*: 44.1kHz<br>
*Bit Depth*: 16 bit<br>
*Input File*: input.wav<br>
*WAV File Header Clip*: 56 bytes (simply skip over wav file header)<br>
*Number of Channels*: 2 (combined into a mono channel for analysis)<br>

=== DFT Output ===

*Time Step*: 5ms<br>
*Frequency Step _(ratio upper/lower)_:* 2 ^ 31.0<br>
*Frequency Range*: about 20Hz - 20kHz (see function _!InitWavelets_ in main.c)<br>
*Minimum Output Amplitude*: 4.0 (see function _SingleDFT_ in main.c)<br>
*Theoretical Maximum Output Amplitude*: 2 ^ 17.0<br>
*Output Specification:*<br>
_As ASCII to stdout: quantities delimited by a space and terminated by a newline_<br>
Time `(int) /5ms` Frequency `(int) log2(Hz)*31` Amplitude `(float) log2(amplitude)`<br>

_*DFTEditor Binary Conversion of DFT Output:*_<br>

*Output Specification:*<br>
_Binary, Big Endian (from DFT Output):_<br>
Int : Short : Float<br>
